newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine Central Bank places $179 mln in repos.
newsitem.headline: Argentine Central Bank places $179 mln in repos.

text.p: Argentina's Central Bank said Thursday it placed $179 million in overnight repurchase agreements at 9.0 percent against government bonds.
In the interbank market, call money rose to 6.0 percent from 5.88 percent at Wednesday's close.
The U.S. dollar fell to 0.99983 pesos from 0.99985 pesos.
